results.title: l-carnitine alleviates synovitis in knee osteoarthritis by regulating lipid accumulation and mitochondrial function through the AMPK-ACC-CPT1 signaling pathway
results.text_hl: Masson staining (Fig. 4e, f) showed that the @CHEMICAL_Carnitine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002331 @@@l-carnitine@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Carnitine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002331 @@@l-carnitine@@@ + @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ groups had less @DISEASE_Fibrosis @DISEASE_MESH:D005355 @@@synovial fibrosis@@@ than the @<m>DISEASE_Anterior_Cruciate_Ligament_Injuries</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000070598 @@@ACLT@@@ group.
